title: Born at Kuliana
cardTitle: This is where it all began
cardDescription: I was born at Kulipal, a small village in the outskirts of Kuliana, northern path of Odisha.

title: Secured global rank of 404
cardDescription: I had account in codechef and practiced a couple questions here and there but never appear for competition. I did and secured global rank of 404.

title: Started B. Tech. CSIT
cardDescription: Not everyone is lucky enough to get into elite IIT. So I got into one of the recognised university of Odisha, SOA University.

title: Completed Class 12
cardDescription: I was the head boy of DAV from 2018 to 2020. I was honoured with the award of disciplined boy and student of the year. I secured 94% in CBSE Board Exam and was class Topper too.

title: Completed Class 10
cardDescription: I was the class Topper of SVS with 96% of marks in CBSE class 10 Board examination. I was the computer geek of my school. I spent nearly 6 years of my life and made couple of friends there.

title: Built my first app
cardDescription: Built my first app Captain aka TicTacToe. However, with no mini max algorithm unfortunately. But it has multiplayer support.

title: Won first Hackathon
cardDescription: I worked on the project more than two weeks start from design to development. It was a great experience after all.

title: Got my first client
cardTitle: Built website and apps for a coaching institute
cardDescription: Rank 1 in google search. Developed Android app and CMS for internal use also focused in user experience and interface with proper competitive analysis.

title: Deployed Klip it
cardTitle: Released a simple website for bidirectional pasting
cardDescription: There are times when I need to visit some site on a desktop which I dont't own. I am too lazy to type link. So I built this little website for bidirectional copy and pasting from PC to Mobile and vice versa. It was built with vite and firebase.

title: Appointed as coordinator of Codex
cardDescription: Codex is one of the coding club in ITER. I am currently coodinator of it. Looking forward to it. Built codex website with other fellow coordinators.

title: Software Developer Intern Vaizle
cardTitle: Vaizle is an ad analysis, social media benchmarking and reporting tool for startups
cardDescription: Developed Angular-based analytics tools for analyzing LinkedIn and YouTube accounts. Implemented a REST API for internal tools in NestJS that runs as a serverless function in GCP.

title: Frontend Developer Intern at MathonGo
cardTitle: MathonGo - India's one of the most trusted Online Math Learning Platform
cardDescription: Improved performance by reducing redundant API calls, enabled client side caching with React Query and media assets. Ported legacy React project to NextJS and employed various data fetching methods

title: Fellow (Open Source Contributor) at Caravel
cardTitle: Plane - ðŸ”¥ Open Source JIRA, Linear and Height Alternative.
cardDescription: Implemented custom theming functionality, allowing users to personalize the appearance and added custom theming functionality, allowing users to personalize the appearance.
